name: Color Escape
description:
Hey buddy, what's your color?

It's not a game. It's a break-o-logical game with colors! I made this game for a year ago for a contest and got a third place with it) It's a very simple platformer with one original idea - you must destroy colored doors to get an exit. Also, u need turn on your logic for it)

There is 3 simple rules of the game:

1) Be careful

2) Read tips

3) Enjoy

Control

moving - WASD

Shoot the color - E

Restart level - ESC

Music on/off - M

Exit - Close window

For save - just close a game.

Аnagram

I like quests. And I suggest you to solve this anagram, which hide an secret information about the game =)

If u solved this, mail me to faadvert@gmail.com for more information!)

Enjoy!!!
